strIntroduction: Get a glimpse of the lesser known side of Hong Kong through the 360 Lantau Sunset Tour. The trip is designed to showcase the untamed beauty of Hong Kong’s largest outlying island – Lantau. The professional guides of 360 Holidays will take you through a series of remarkable sights that form part of your tranquil and relaxing experience. Walking around Hong Kong’s oldest fishing village, where you will be able to experience the unique atmosphere of a tightly-knitted community interconnected by stilt houses built above the tidal flats of Lantau. Enjoy a specialty dinner at the Tai O Heritage Hotel and relish in the culinary delight that marries the best of Tai O flavours with fusion cooking.
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: 360 Lantau Sunset Tour

strIntroduction: Pier 16 Macau 3D World is the first large scale 3D museum in Macau and located at Ponte 16 Resort in Macau. The approximately 18,000 square feet museum has over 100 photography points in 7 theme zones, including MJ in 3D, 3D Jurassic World, 3D Macau Journey, Touch of French, Romantic Story, Chinese Culture and 3D Interactive Experience Zone. The 3D Museum offers visitors a chance to pose for interesting photos with the various exhibits and 3D paintings.
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Macau
strTitle: PIER 16 MACAU 3D WORLD

strIntroduction: Trick Eye Museum, the world-class 3D museum that was crowned as the Number 1 attraction by TripAdvisor in April 2014 (museum category), was established in 2010 in South Korea. It features paintings on plain surfaces that magically appear to be three dimensional through the use of optical illusion. After capturing the hearts of millions of visitors around the globe, it has now descended upon Hong Kong at The Peak Galleria Mall, high up on The Peak. And it became one of the popular tourist attractions in Hong Kong now.
strLocation: Hong Kong and Macau, Hong Kong
strTitle: Trick Eye Museum Hong Kong
